mapper.insert: INSERT INTO orderpurchase (omid, omncode, omnname, olength, obread, otoast, ocheese, ovegetables, osauce, oprice, oqty, odate) SELECT cmid, cmncode, mn.mnname, clength, cbread, ctoast, ccheese, cvegetables, csauce, cprice, cqty, NOW() FROM cart c, menu mn WHERE c.cmncode = mn.mncode AND cmid = #{cmid} AND cseq = #{cseq}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM cart WHERE cseq = #{cseq} AND cmid = #{cmid}
mapper.select: SELECT CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%y%m%d'), LPAD(IFNULL(MAX(SUBSTR(SEQ, -5)), 1), 5, '0')) AS orderMaxNo FROM ( SELECT MAX(CAST(oseq AS SIGNED))+1 AS SEQ FROM orderpurchase) AA WHERE AA.SEQ LIKE CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%y%m%d'), '%' )
